articles.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' lawyers want him to serve 50-month sentence at low-security New Jersey facility - NBC News
articles.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs' lawyers want the hip-hop mogul to serve his 50-month prison sentence on interstate prostitution charges at a low-security facility in New Jersey that has a drug treatment program, according to a letter to a judge Monday.
